div.div: Follow our emergency messages on Twitter | Facebook | RSS Clarkston School District
Emergency Messages as of 11:17 am, Wed. Apr. 29
Subscribe to receive FlashAlert messages from Clarkston School District.

form.strong: Primary email address for a new account:

div.a: And/or follow our FlashAlerts via Twitter

div.p: FlashAlert utilizes the free service Twitter to distribute emergency text messages. While you are welcome to register your cell phone text message address directly into the FlashAlert system, we recommend that you simply "follow" the FlashAlert account for Clarkston School District by clicking on the link below and logging in to (or creating) your free Twitter account. Twitter sends messages out exceptionally fast thanks to arrangements they have made with the cell phone companies.

p.a:
Click here to add Clarkston School District to your Twitter account or create one.
@CLKschools

div.div:
Clarkston School District Kindergarten Registration - 04/07/20
Clarkston, WA - If your child will be age five by August 31, 2020, you will need to fill out registration paperwork for the elementary school they will be attending in the fall. Clarkston elementary schools will have kindergarten registration packets available for pick up at the following locations on Thursday, April 9, 2020:
Grantham: Grantham Elementary School food distribution site from 11:00 am - 12:30 pm. Return completed packets to the same location, Monday – Friday from 11:00 am – 12:30 pm by May 1, 2020.
Heights: Heights Elementary School at the front of the school from 11:00 am – 7:00 pm. Return completed packets to the same location, Monday – Friday from 8:00 am – 3:00 pm by May 1, 2020.
Highland: Highland Elementary School at the bus pick up area from 10:30 am – 12:30 pm. Please park in the parking lot and walk over if you are able to. Return completed packets to the Grantham Elementary School food distribution site, Monday – Friday from 11:00 am – 12:30 pm by May 1, 2020.
Parkway: Clarkston High School food distribution site from 11:00 am – 12:30 pm. Return completed packets to the same location, Monday – Friday from 11:00 am – 12:30 pm by May 1, 2020.
If you are unable to pick up a registration packet for your child, please call your child’s school and leave a message with your contact information. Grantham – 509.758.2503, Heights – 509.758.8180, Highland – 509.758.5531, Parkway – 509.758.2553.
###
